segments.text: Do you have the same in different sizes ? The trousers are too long for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . Yes , here you are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will the trousers shrink when washed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , they won't . They are shrink proof .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's good . I will take it .
segments.speaker: S1
